content:
I couldn't find an existing issue on Github so perhaps I ask here first before opening a new issue:

https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/std/iter/trait.IntoIterator.html

I've noticed several things:

  • keywords aren't highlighted properly (eg. type isn't bold) - stable works
  • the implementors section has duplicate entries - affects stable too
  • the implementors section doesn't contain any information (assoc. types) - stable works
  • some implementors don't have a src link

image.png

For the missing bold, I already have in my "to fix" list. Should be there next week or so.

For the others, can you create an issue for them please?
Do you mind if I put all the implementors related issues into on issue or do you prefer an issue per bullet point?
I'd prefer one per bullet point. You can group them by theme though (UI issues vs badly filled parts) if that it makes simpler for you.
@cynecx I created the fix for boldness here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/86650
